name: Doug Wilson
biography:
Self-employed product and graphic designer. Clients have included Bloomingdales, JC Penney, Nordstrom, Paramount Studios, Got Milk? and the Los Angeles Dodgers.
Trends introduced in product and graphic design include "pub mirrors" (mirrors displaying logos of liquors and beers) and novelty mirrors for home use; "Hot Lips" for Bloomingdales (products involved fifteen licenses); "Logo Licensing" (logos used as design vehicles on products, e.g., Hershey's on bed linens for Burlington Mills).

Source: www.funlovinggifts.com
